width.description: Provide classes to set the accordion width.

spacing.description: Provide classes to set the vertical spacing between items.

disabled.description: Set the accordion disabled state for all items.

padding.description: Provide classes to set the accordion item padding styles.

hover.description: Provide classes to set the accordion item hover styles.

rounded.description: Provide classes to set the accordion item rounded styles.

caretOpen.description: Set the rotation of the item caret in the open state.

caretClosed.description: Set the rotation of the item caret in the closed state.

regionControl.description: Provide arbitrary classes to the trigger button region.

regionPanel.description: Provide arbitrary classes to the content panel region.

regionCaret.description: Provide arbitrary classes to the caret icon region.

transitionIn.description: Provide the transition to used on entry.

transitionOut.description: Provide the transition to used on exit.

events.name: on:toggle
events.description: Fires when an accordion item is toggled.
events.params: { event: Event, id: string, open: boolean, autocollapse: boolean }
